Package org.sbmlsqueezer.kinetics

This package contains one class for each supported kinetic law.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
LawListener  
 

Class Summary
BasicKineticLaw An abstract super class of specialized kinetic laws.
Convenience This is the standard convenience kinetics which is only appropriated for systems whose stochiometric matrix has full column rank.
ConvenienceIndependent This is the thermodynamically independent form of the convenience kinetics.
GeneralizedMassAction This class creates rate equations according to the generalized mass action rate law.
HillEquation This class creates a Hill equation as defined in the paper"Hill Kinetics meets P Systems: A Case Study on Gene Regulatory Networks as Computing Agents in silico and in vivo" of Hinze et al.
IrrevCompetNonCooperativeEnzymes  
IrrevNonModulatedNonInteractingEnzymes This class implements SBO:0000150 and all of its special cases.
KineticLawGenerator This class identifies and generates the missin kinetic laws for a the selected model in the given plugin.

PingPongMechanism TODO: comment missing
RandomOrderMechanism This class creates a kinetic equation according to the random order mechanism (see Cornish-Bowden: Fundamentals of Enzyme Kinetics, p.
ZerothOrderForwardGMAK This class creates generalized mass action rate equations with zeroth order in all reactants.
ZerothOrderReverseGMAK TODO: comment missing
 

Exception Summary
IllegalFormatException Exception for cases in which the SBML file may be corrupted
ModificationException TODO: comment missing
RateLawNotApplicableException An exception to be thrown if the selected kinetics is not applicable to the given reaction.
 

Package org.sbmlsqueezer.kinetics Description

This package contains one class for each supported kinetic law. There are also specialized exceptions for cases, in which a kinetic law cannot be applied to a certain reaction. This package also contains the KineticLawGenerator, which assigns kinetic laws to reactions within a model.
